alert.note: Alert for Pleasants; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washington, southeastern Morgan, southwestern Pleasants and northeastern Wood Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Beverly, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Marietta, Beverly, Vienna, Williamstown, Belmont, Boaz, Newport, North Hills, Lowell, Stockport, Macksburg, Lower Salem, Willow Island, Hackney, Waverly, Fleming, Bartlett and Devola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 178 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 17. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 18 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
